item.title: ‘The Righteous Gemstones’ Artisans on How They Embraced the Chaos for the Final Season: ‘It Is So Stupid and So Funny — and It Worked’
item.description: The dynasty atop HBO’s “The Righteous Gemstones” spent four seasons disseminating a breathless reign of debaucherous, selfish and hysterically ungodly behavior from the pulpit of their South Carolina
